Generation IV.Diamond: It lives in flower patches and avoids detection by curling up to look like a flowering plant.
Generation IV.Pearl: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.
Generation IV.Platinum: The flowers all over its body burst into bloom if it is lovingly hugged and senses gratitude.
Generation IV.HeartGold: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.

Generation VI.X: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.
Generation VI.Y: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It lives in common flower patches but is rarely noticed. It is often mistaken for a flowering plant when curled up.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Upon taking in the scent of a particular rare flower, Shaymin is enveloped in light, and its tiny body transforms. I took a whiff of the flower myself, but alas, my body remained unchanged.
